act-restoredCard: đã khôi phục thẻ __card__ vào bảng __board__
act-unjoinMember: đã xóa thành viên __member__ khỏi thẻ __card__
add-checklist-item: Thêm Một Mục Vào Danh Sách Kiểm Tra
admin-desc: Có thể xem và chỉnh sửa những thẻ, xóa thành viên và thay đổi cài đặt cho bảng.
app-is-offline: Wekan đang tải, vui lòng đợi. Tải lại trang có thể làm mất dữ liệu. Nếu Wekan không thể tải được, Vui lòng kiểm tra lại Wekan server.
attachment-delete-pop: Xóa tệp đính kèm là vĩnh viễn. Không có khôi phục.
auto-watch: Tự động xem bảng lúc được tạo ra
avatar-too-big: Hình đại diện quá to (70KB tối đa)
board-private-info: Bảng này sẽ chuyển sang chế độ private.
board-public-info: Bảng này sẽ chuyển sang chế độ public.
card-delete-notice: Hành động xóa là không thể khôi phục. Bạn sẽ mất hết các hoạt động liên quan đến thẻ này.
card-delete-pop: All actions will be removed from the activity feed and you won't be able to re-open the card. There is no undo.
card-delete-suggest-archive: You can archive a card to remove it from the board and preserve the activity.
card-labels-title: Change the labels for the card.
card-members-title: Add or remove members of the board from the card.
close-board-pop: You will be able to restore the board by clicking the “Archives” button from the home header.
confirm-checklist-delete-dialog: Are you sure you want to delete checklist
copyChecklistToManyCardsPopup-title: Copy Checklist Template to Many Cards
copyChecklistToManyCardsPopup-instructio: Destination Card Titles and Descriptions in this JSON format
copyChecklistToManyCardsPopup-format: [ {"title": "First card title", "description":"First card description"}, {"title":"Second card title","description":"Second card description"},{"title":"Last card title","description":"Last card description"} ]
email-enrollAccount-subject: An account created for you on __siteName__
email-enrollAccount-text:
Hello __user__,

To start using the service, simply click the link below.

__url__

Thanks.
email-invite-text:
Dear __user__,

__inviter__ invites you to join board "__board__" for collaborations.

Please follow the link below:

__url__

Thanks.
email-resetPassword-text:
Hello __user__,

To reset your password, simply click the link below.

__url__

Thanks.
email-verifyEmail-text:
Hello __user__,

To verify your account email, simply click the link below.

__url__

Thanks.
error-board-notAdmin: You need to be admin of this board to do that
error-board-notAMember: You need to be a member of this board to do that
error-json-malformed: Your text is not valid JSON
error-json-schema: Your JSON data does not include the proper information in the correct format
filter-on-desc: You are filtering cards on this board. Click here to edit filter.
header-logo-title: Go back to your boards page.
import-sandstorm-warning: Imported board will delete all existing data on board and replace it with imported board.
import-board-instruction-trello: In your Trello board, go to 'Menu', then 'More', 'Print and Export', 'Export JSON', and copy the resulting text.
import-board-instruction-wekan: In your Wekan board, go to 'Menu', then 'Export board', and copy the text in the downloaded file.
import-json-placeholder: Paste your valid JSON data here
import-members-map: Your imported board has some members. Please map the members you want to import to Wekan users
import-user-select: Pick the Wekan user you want to use as this member
just-invited: You are just invited to this board
label-delete-pop: There is no undo. This will remove this label from all cards and destroy its history.
last-admin-desc: You can’t change roles because there must be at least one admin.
leave-board-pop: Are you sure you want to leave __boardTitle__? You will be removed from all cards on this board.
list-archive-cards: Archive all cards in this list
list-archive-cards-pop: This will remove all the cards in this list from the board. To view archived cards and bring them back to the board, click “Menu” > “Archived Items”.
list-move-cards: Move all cards in this list
list-select-cards: Select all cards in this list
list-delete-pop: All actions will be removed from the activity feed and you won't be able to recover the list. There is no undo.
list-delete-suggest-archive: You can archive a list to remove it from the board and preserve the activity.
muted-info: You will never be notified of any changes in this board
name: Name
normal-desc: Can view and edit cards. Can't change settings.
notify-participate: Receive updates to any cards you participate as creater or member
notify-watch: Receive updates to any boards, lists, or cards you’re watching
page-maybe-private: This page may be private. You may be able to view it by logging in.
paste-or-dragdrop: to paste, or drag & drop image file to it (image only)
private-desc: This board is private. Only people added to the board can view and edit it.
public-desc: This board is public. It's visible to anyone with the link and will show up in search engines like Google. Only people added to the board can edit.
quick-access-description: Star a board to add a shortcut in this bar.
remove-member-pop: Remove __name__ (__username__) from __boardTitle__? The member will be removed from all cards on this board. They will receive a notification.
search-cards: Search from card titles and descriptions on this board
set-wip-limit-value: Set a limit for the maximum number of tasks in this list
show-cards-minimum-count: Show cards count if list contains more than
star-board-title: Click to star this board. It will show up at top of your boards list.
starred-boards-description: Starred boards show up at the top of your boards list.
title: Title
tracking-info: You will be notified of any changes to those cards you are involved as creator or member.
warn-list-archived: warning: this card is in an archived list
watching-info: You will be notified of any change in this board
what-to-do: What do you want to do?
wipLimitErrorPopup-dialog-pt1: The number of tasks in this list is higher than the WIP limit you've defined.
wipLimitErrorPopup-dialog-pt2: Please move some tasks out of this list, or set a higher WIP limit.
smtp-host-description: The address of the SMTP server that handles your emails.
smtp-port-description: The port your SMTP server uses for outgoing emails.
smtp-tls-description: Enable TLS support for SMTP server
send-smtp-test: Send a test email to yourself
email-invite-register-text:
Dear __user__,

__inviter__ invites you to Wekan for collaborations.

Please follow the link below:
__url__

And your invitation code is: __icode__

Thanks.
email-smtp-test-text: You have successfully sent an email
error-notAuthorized: You are not authorized to view this page.
